subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Rex Ryan sent a game ball to Marty Schottenheimer after last weekend’s playoff upset of the San Diego Chargers, the team that fired Schottenheimer after a 14-2 regular season.
snippet: Jets Coach Rex Ryan sent a game ball to Marty Schottenheimer after last weekend’s playoff upset of the San Diego Chargers, the team that fired Schottenheimer after a 14-2 regular season.
